If you do not, then I have no choice but to ssswing the radiant hammer of vengeance down upon your meager frames!1�

That blade...1�
, can you show him the proof of your bonds to this forest, too?1�
Show your 3����?Sounds like a plan.No can do.1�
! Do you want to get us burned to a crisp!?1�
...Or are you saying that because you <gasp> left it back in Adoulin?1�
Did you leave it behind?Yes, silly me.No, I've got it right here.1�
How could you!?1�
Wait a minute...1�
Ugh!This better be the last time you try to pull my leg like that,  ! I don't think my heart can take much more.1�
You bring forth the 3���� before the Winged Scourge.�
The Winged Scourge casts a burning stare in your direction.�
Hmmm... Ortharsssyne and 6����...1�
You mean to tell me that you are not like the rest of those pillagers, but ssstaunch believers in August and his desire to preserve the forest?1�
You refer to the founder king by his first name? So...you knew him personally?1�
But he lived centuries upon centuries ago! You couldn't possibly--1�
Of courssse I knew him, for I am Sajj'aka.1�
Not only did I know the first Adoulin king, I ssswore my allegiance to him.1�
Was it centuries ago? Millennia? Time flows for many thingsss, but upon Sajj'aka it touchesss not.1�
Seasss change. Landsss change. Even should the starsss fade from existence, the covenant made with Augussst shall not break.1�
In my eyes, the lives of your kind are as delicate and transient as bubbles in a ssstream, your moments of glory mere sssparks from flint.1�
Inconsssequential, insssignificant, insssubstantial--such is how I came to conceive of your peoples.1�
Augussst has been the only exception.1�
His aura shone brighter than my refulgent scales, and his resolve was ssstrong enough to wrest me from the realm of shadows.1�
That is not the lone justification for why my memory of him will persissst until the end of time, but it is an important one.1�
And what of you, ssspindly-legged foal?1�
Does the ressspect for the king you claim to harbor within that miniscule bosom of yours amount to even a drop in the sea compared to what I showed him while he was alive?1�
<Snort>Hopefully you can at least answer this sssimple question.1�
As a preface...you are aware of the ssseven guardians that protect the Ulbukan hinterland, are you not?1�
Yes, I am. They're the Naakuals, right?1�
Is that the ephemeral sssobriquet they have been given by your kind? Very well.1�
I shall not waste my breath explaining the ressst.1�
However, there was one more guardian who fought alongside August...a worthy tiger whose fur shone a lussstrous gold.1�
That must be Terrcualn.1�
I recall reading about him during one of my trips to the library. What was the title of the book, though...?1�
Aha, ��His Majesty and the Golden Beast��! That's it!1�
Ah, booksss. An inconvenient form of immortality, but perhapsss the best your ephemeral kind can hope for. If you are truly learned, you should have no qualms about a simple tessst.1�
Pray tell me, where did August meet Terrcualn in combat?1�
Umm... Where they fought, you say? Well...that would be...1�
In the end, you care as little for August as I care for dissemblers.1�

, if you would... Please show His Eminence the item you found in 8����.1�

8����? I have not heard of such a place. Let me sssee...1�
Hmm... Yesss, I can sense Siren's presence emanating from this bell...1�
However, she seems to have lost her power and is immersed in a deep ssslumber.1�
A deep slumber?1�
So if she were to regain her power, she would wake up eventually!?1�
Do not be so hasssty, Princess. Even with my great wisdom, I am uncertain how to go about such a matter...1�
However, it is clear that we must focusss on how to restore her power before we can proceed any further.1�
Yes, I suppose you are right.1�
Although, how can we do that, I wonder...1�
Hm? S-sweets, you say?1�

That has nothing to do with Siren!1�

I don't think that has anything to do with Siren...1�

And if Siren regains her power and is able to wake up...1�
I forgot something important!1�

I mean, she is a powerful being who is able to control all of nature...1�
I highly doubt offering Siren sweets will convince her to help us.1�

, I don't think that's going to get us anywhere.1�
The Communion!1�
